functions.tag: {pages: ['[{"text":"===================\\n"}, {"color":"green","text":"Monthly bill for the        Verified Helper\\n           role"},{"text":"\\n===================\\n\\nTo acquire the Verified Helper role, please proceed by transferring the monthly amount of $35 per week to the following bank account:"}]', '[{"text":"▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊▊\\n"},{"color":"gray","text":"(rub off coating)"},{"text":"\\n\\nIf the coating has already been rubbed off, please keep us informed whether someone else might be giving money to our account."}]', '{"text":"===================\\n  Why you are getting           this book\\n===================\\n\\nThis book is being provided to anyone who beat the angry sheep on \\"easy mode\\".\\n\\"Easy mode\\" is a complicated abbreviation without further illustration that refers to"}', '[{"text":"having the server properties set in a way that limits the features of Snapshot 20w14s. \\n\\nTo disable easy mode, set the "},{"color":"dark_gray","text":"function-permission-level"}," key in the ",{"color":"dark_gray","text":"server.properties"},{"text":" file to 3 or higher.\\n\\nIf you do not want to"}]', '[{"text":"host a server, you are once again invited to join the official server at "}, {"translate":"20w14s.server_ip"}, "."]'], title: "VH bill", author: "the der discohund"}
